plot: A romantic story of a perfect guy who lacks courage to approach girls, a new flight attendant with very high standards for boys, and two friends who make a living by setting up a love confession business on the Internet.
title: Chob Kod Like Chai Kod Love
plot_es: A romantic story of a perfect guy who lacks courage to approach girls, a new flight attendant with very high standards for boys, and two friends who make a living by setting up a love confession business on the Internet.
original_name: Chob Kod Like Chai Kod Love
